incidents.name: Twilio Programmable Voice Text To Speech

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Voice's Text To Speech was degraded for 60 minutes between 19:00 and 20:00 Pacific Time on 08/27/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced problem symptoms such as delayed response times. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Customers Using Studio May Have Experienced Issues With Calls, Steps and Events

incident_updates.body: The issues reported in Studio have been resolved and the service is operating normally at this time.

The issues reported in Studio are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our engineers have identified the issue causing dropped calls, missing Steps being written, missing Step context, and otherwise dropped Studio events; and have deployed a fix. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: 10DLC T-Mobile Provisioning Issue NULL Internal ID

incident_updates.body: Twilio 10DLC campaigns was degraded for 3 days, and 19 hours between 07:00 on 08/19/2024 and 14:00 on 08/23/2024 Pacific time. During this time newly onboarded numbers could experience some failed traffic towards T-Mobile. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failure To Hutchison Network In Hong Kong

incident_updates.body: SMS Delivery Failure to Hutchison Network in Hong Kong was degraded for 3 hours and 50 minutes between 03:00 UTC and 06:50 Pacific Time on 2024/08/24. During this period of time, customers may have experienced SMS delivery failures at Hutchison Network in Hong Kong. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Increased Latency and Elevated HTTP 500/503's affecting Verify V2 API

incident_updates.body: Twilio Verify V2 API was degraded for 9 minutes minutes between 12:04 and 12:13 Pacific Time on 08/23/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced increased latency, elevated HTTP 500 and 503's status codes for a subset of requests on the Verify V2 API. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Programmable Voice Calls and Conferences Using DE1 Region was Degraded Between 15:33 - 15:52 Pacific Time on Aug 22, 2024

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Voice was degraded for 19 minutes between 15:33 - 15:52 Pacific Time on Aug 22, 2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced calls and conferences that may not have succeeded if using the de1 region, and established calls and conferences may have had degraded call quality. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Programmable Messaging was degraded due to a capacity constraint on Twilio's Toll-Free MMS peering partner connection.

incident_updates.body:
Twilio's Programmable Messaging was degraded from August 15 at 8:02 AM PT until August 22 at 12:50 AM PT. This was due to a capacity constraint on Twilio's Toll-Free MMS peering partner connection.  A small number of outbound Toll-Free MMS experienced failure error 30008. Twilio engineers collaborated with the partner to increase capacity and fully restore Toll-Free MMS traffic.
The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Subaccounts and Support Accounts Unable to View Console Usage Summary Page

incident_updates.body: Twilio Console was partially degraded for 15 minutes between 00:45 and 01:00 Pacific Time on 08/22/2024. During this period of time, certain users with the "Support" role or viewing the pages as a subaccount may have been unable to view the usage summary and subaccount usage summary pages. The issue has now been resolved.
